_header: While that I was sober sin ne did I not
_description: Through drunkenness came sin — a single couplet

BLHar2316.Transcription: Whil ȝat i was sobyr sinne ne dede i nowhtbut in drunkeschipe i dede ȝe werste ȝat mihten ben thowht
